catalog_script_client.name: catalog script to hide

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_76f946e347d6a11026847688c26d43e2
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>true</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Star Foundation ">53a681af4792a11026847688c26d4396</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:aba605ef4792a11026847688c26d4323</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>catalog script to hide</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading, isTemplate) {
    g_form.clearOptions();

    if (isLoading || newValue === '') {
        return;
    }
    else if (newValue == 'tution') {
        alert(newValue);
        g_form.removeOption('trained_on', 'dance');
        g_form.removeOption('trained_on', 'art');
        g_form.removeOption('trained_on', 'swimming');
        g_form.removeOption('trained_on', 'karate');
        g_form.removeOption('trained_on', 'games');
        g_form.addOption('trained_on', 'subject', 'Subject knowledge');
        g_form.addOption('trained_on', 'computer', 'Computer Course');
    } else if (newValue == 'summer') {
        alert(newValue);

        g_form.removeOption('trained_on', 'subject');
        g_form.removeOption('trained_on', 'computer');

        //g_form.addOption()
        g_form.addOption('trained_on', 'dance', 'Dance');
        g_form.addOption('trained_on', 'art', 'Art&Craft');
        g_form.addOption('trained_on', 'swimming', 'Swimming');
        g_form.addOption('trained_on', 'karate', 'Karate');
        g_form.addOption('trained_on', 'games', 'Games & sports');
		g_form.disableAttachments()
    }
    //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below

}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-04-25 15:28:50</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>76f946e347d6a11026847688c26d43e2</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>catalog script to hide</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="My custom App" source="x_698230_my_custom">d01a706f475e611026847688c26d438c</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="My custom App">d01a706f475e611026847688c26d438c</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_76f946e347d6a11026847688c26d43e2</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-04-25 15:34:07</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>0</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
